lead_paragraph: Deontay Wilder retained his World Boxing Council heavyweight championship with a knockout of Artur Szpilka in the ninth round at Barclays Center.
snippet: Deontay Wilder retained his World Boxing Council heavyweight championship with a knockout of Artur Szpilka in the ninth round at Barclays Center.
abstract: Deontay Wilder defeats Artur Szpilka by ninth-round knockout to retain World Boxing Council heavyweight title.
